title: Client keeps crashing
body:
In the last 2 - 3 days my league client has been crashing no stop and I'm losing lp and having to wait 30 min queue times because of it, I have tried many things to fix and I've uninstalled & repaired a couple of times. All drivers are up to date as far as i know.

On windows 10.

replies.body: When it crashes, do you get a specific error message such as bugsplat or "LeagueofLegends.exe has stopped working"? Does it crash during a specific event or in a specific area in the client? With a bit more detail, I can provide accurate steps to take in order to resolve this.
No it just freezes and never un freezes so i have to close it down everytime and it's starting to happen to a couple of friends of my
Also i have plays.tv which does crash leauge sometimes, but I've tried completely closing it and deleting it off my computer but my client still crashes.

Gotcha. I'd like you to complete a [clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) and ensure both the [Windows Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) and [SmartScreen Filter](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/930168) are disabled.

Let me know if any of those steps resolved this.
So even though it doesn't happen as much it's still happening.

At this point, we'll need to dive into some system logs to investigate further. I recommend reaching out to our tech team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). If you run and attach a set of logs to your ticket with our [Hextech Repair Tool,](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) it will expedite the troubleshooting process.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Could you please verify if you're facing similar symptoms? 

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/ewAGq5Xv-game-is-taking-up-1-2-mbps-dedicated-yet-running-very-slowly-freezing-disconnecting-glitching
Nah i have nothing like that man
